name: A Sad Sunday
description:
A Sad Sunday

Did you already have the feeling your weekend was wasted? If yes, then this game is four you!

A Sad Sunday is an interactive short story about a humanized owl living a pointless day. You can make choices about what you do or not do on your Sunday.  Next thing you know, it's Monday again.

  •  Interactive short story with choices!
  • Hand drawed illustrations with pencils and stuff
  •  Available in French or English
  • Takes about 10 min to complete
  • Sad Sunday feelings

How to play

  • Click on the hyperlink of your choice to make decisions about the story.

Soundtrack

The game doesn't have any soundtrack, but you can listen to one of these depressing songs while playing:

  • Car Seat Headrest - No Passion
  • MGMT - Days That Got Away

Made with Twine.

Drawn, written and everything else by Maude Vaillancourt.
